data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 Fall Creators Update
data.actual_result: Others only hear your voice from their left ear
data.expected_result: Others hear your voice in mono in both ears
data.short_description: Microphones aren't being downmixed to mono
data.steps_to_repro: - Have an audio interface that outputs to 2 channels (e.g. Scarlett Solo, Steinberg UR12, Behringer UM2) - Enter a voice channel/call and start talking
